article.title: U.S. Special Ops Command Awards $500 Million Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Arma Global Corporation, Tampa, Florida, has been awarded a $500 million single-award indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract to provide Tactical Local Area Network (TACLAN) family of system acquisition, design, integration, production, and delivery in support of U.S. Special Operations Command. U.S. Special Operations Command is the contracting activity.
